Class Menu

java.lang.Object
Menu
public class Menu extends Object
Represents the menu of the restaurant. The menu consists of both a la carte and promotional package items.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Menu​(ArrayList<MenuItem> menu)
    Constructor specifying the menu of the restaurant.

  • Constructor Details

    • Menu

      public Menu​(ArrayList<MenuItem> menu)
      Constructor specifying the menu of the restaurant.
      Parameters:
      menu - Menu of the restaurant

  • Method Details

    • printMenu

      public void printMenu​(int choice)
      Prints the menu of the restaurant.
      Parameters:
      choice - 0 to print full menu, 1 to print a la carte items only, 2 to print promotional package items only

    • printMenuItem

      public void printMenuItem​(MenuItem item)
      Prints the details of a menu item in the menu.
      Parameters:
      item - Menu item to be printed

    • addToMenu

      public void addToMenu​(MenuItem item)
      Adds a menu item to the menu. If a la carte, item is added to top of menu. If promotional package, item is added to bottom of menu.
      Parameters:
      item - Menu item to be added to the menu

    • removeFromMenu

      public void removeFromMenu​(MenuItem item)
      Removes a menu item from the menu.
      Parameters:
      item - Menu item to be removed from the menu

    • getMenuSize

      public int getMenuSize​(int choice)
      Gets the number of menu items in the menu.
      Parameters:
      choice - 0 to get the number of all items (a la carte and promotional package) in the menu, 1 to get the number of a la carte items in the menu
      Returns:
      the number of menu items

    • getMenuItems

      public ArrayList<MenuItem> getMenuItems()
      Gets the menu of the restaurant.
      Returns:
      the menu of the restaurant

    • UpdateAlaCarte

      public void UpdateAlaCarte​(MenuItem Item)
      Update the details of an a la carte menu item in the menu.
      Parameters:
      Item - The a la carte menu item to be updated

    • UpdatePromoPackage

      public void UpdatePromoPackage​(MenuItem Item)
      Update the details of a promotional package menu item in the menu.
      Parameters:
      Item - The promotional package menu item to be updated
